title: Emerging Currencies Shrug Off Weakness as USD Loses Haven Appeal
description: Emerging-market currencies held steady as the dollar weakened on Monday even as the US capture of Venezuela’s leader Nicolas Maduro increased the perception of geopolitical risks.
content: Emerging-market currencies held steady as the dollar weakened on Monday even as the US capture of Venezuela’s leader Nicolas Maduro increased the perception of geopolitical risks.
